trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage"></xref> interface to create a message that acts as a response to a method call on a remote object.
The MethodReturnMessageWrapper class is used by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework.
You do not need to create an instance of the MethodReturnMessageWrapper class directly; instead, use the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage> interface.
The MethodReturnMessageWrapper class wraps remoting data for passing between message sinks.
A remoting server sends a MethodReturnMessageWrapper message to a client in response to a client request.
Wraps an <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage"></xref> to create a <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodReturnMessageWrapper"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodReturnMessageWrapper> class is used by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework.

You do not need to create an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodReturnMessageWrapper> class directly; instead, use the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage> interface.
A message that acts as an outgoing method call on a remote object.
Gets the number of arguments passed to the method.
The method belongs to a remote object.
A <xref:System.Int32> that represents the number of arguments passed to a method.
Gets an array of arguments passed to the method.
The method belongs to a remote object.
An array of type <xref:System.Object> that represents the arguments passed to a method.
Gets the exception thrown during the method call, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the method did not throw an exception.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The <xref:System.Exception> thrown during the method call, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the method did not throw an exception.
Gets a method argument, as an object, at a specified index.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The index of the requested argument.
The method argument as an object.
Gets the name of a method argument at a specified index.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The index of the requested argument.
The name of the method argument.
Returns the specified argument marked as a <xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref> parameter or an <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> parameter.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The index of the requested argument.
The specified argument marked as a <xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref> parameter or an <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> parameter.
Returns the name of the specified argument marked as a <xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref> parameter or an <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> parameter.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The index of the requested argument.
The argument name, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the current method is not implemented.
Gets a flag that indicates whether the method can accept a variable number of arguments.
The method belongs to a remote object.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the method can accept a variable number of arguments; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext"></xref> for the current method call.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext"></xref> for the current method call.
Gets the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase> of the called method.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase> of the called method.
Gets the name of the invoked method.
The method belongs to a remote object.
A <xref:System.String> that contains the name of the invoked method.
Gets an object that contains the method signature.
The method belongs to a remote object.
A <xref:System.Object> that contains the method signature.

Gets the number of arguments in the method call that are marked as <xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref> parameters or <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> parameters.
The method belongs to a remote object.

A <xref:System.Int32> that represents the number of arguments in the method call that are marked as <xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref> parameters or <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> parameters.

Gets an array of arguments in the method call that are marked as <xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref> parameters or <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> parameters.
The method belongs to a remote object.

An array of type <xref:System.Object> that represents the arguments in the method call that are marked as <xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref> parameters or <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> parameters.
An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> interface that represents a collection of the remoting message's properties.
The message acts as a response to a method call on a remote object.
An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> interface that represents a collection of the remoting message's properties.
Gets the return value of the method call.
The method belongs to a remote object.
A <xref:System.Object> that represents the return value of the method call.
Gets the full type name of the remote object on which the method call is being made.
A <xref:System.String> that contains the full type name of the remote object on which the method call is being made.
Gets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the remote object on which the method call is being made.
The URI of a remote object.
